title: VARIOUS MATERIALS : Handy Sounds
description: Responsive and handy sounds when you need them!
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


“As the pack name suggests, this collection contains sounds of soft/heavy hits and impacts, crashes, and movements of various materials. 


{A) The sounds are grouped by materials such as metal, glass, wood, heavy cloth, and rock, rather than by object types. This gives users the liberty to emulate various object sounds according to their requirement and approach.”


(B) All sounds vary from subtle to significant in terms of their tonality, strength, and length.”


NOTE: “If you want more sounds, we have 5 more similar packs that contain sound categories like this pack. Please do check them out.

  • Sound Of Metals: Pack1  
  •  Crashes And Trashes : Pack1  
  •  Broken Glasses: Pack1
  •  Impacts : Concrete And Rocks
  •  Rocks In Motion Pack1 ”
